definition: lacking special distinction, rank, or status, in heraldry, any of several conventional figures used on shields
details:
adjective
- lacking special distinction, rank, or status
= synonyms: average
- not exceptional in any way especially in quality or ability or size or degree
= example: not exceptional in any way especially in quality or ability or size or degree
noun
- in heraldry, any of several conventional figures used on shields
= example: in heraldry, any of several conventional figures used on shields
- an early bicycle with a very large front wheel and small back wheel
= synonyms: ordinary bicycle
- a judge of a probate court
- a clergyman appointed to prepare condemned prisoners for death
- the expected or commonplace condition or situation
= example: the expected or commonplace condition or situation
